title: [Blighted Forest]
description: The trail winds through the dense forest, throwing off divergent branches that disappear in the darkness with the first turn.  Shadows lurk on all sides, sheltered within the green-tinged gloom.
The trail winds through the dense forest, throwing off divergent branches that disappear in the verdure with the first turn.  Shadows lurk on all sides, sheltered within the green-tinged gloom.
